alert.note: Alert for Lee; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 4:27PM CDT until July 09 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Northeastern Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... Central Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 427 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Keownville, or 8 miles east of New Albany, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, New Albany, Baldwyn, Verona, Trace State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Ecru, Keownville, New Harmony, Blair, Furrs, Sherman, Blue Springs, Graham, Endville, Beech Springs, Union Hill, Palmetto and Alpine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
